9. Dark soy sauce (2-3 tablespoons)
10. Light soy sauce (2-3 tablespoons)
11. Sugar (1-2 teaspoons)

5. Add the pork ribs to the pot and stir to coat them evenly with the spices. Cook until the pork starts to brown.

7. Bring the broth to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 1-2 hours, or until the pork is tender. You can add mushrooms during the last 15 minutes of cooking.

This includes details such as the specific commands for the machine's control system, the format of the tool data, and the sequence of operations.

Post processors are essential for ensuring that the CNC machine can accurately execute the toolpath data generated by the CAM system, and they are often specific to the make and model of the CNC machine. They can be created or modified by the machine tool manufacturer, third-party developers, or users with programming skills.
